description: This file serves as the entry point for a React web application, importing core React libraries, CSS styling, and the main App component. It initializes the React application by rendering the App component inside a strict mode wrapper into the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render React components in the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
